text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the warped, mocking shirt may be protected in the US as a fair use parody. Section 2.B, under the heading 'The big U.S. defense: fair use (parody/satire)', specifically discusses the warped version mocking a joke, stating: 'Warped version mocking a famous joke in the show: best shot at parody, but commercial merchandising still often loses if it takes too much and harms the merch/licensing market.' This directly addresses the possibility of a fair use parody defense for that specific shirt variation under US law.", "criterion_id": "a08540da-4efa-444f-a6e5-0bd865227bb8"}
